name: Dream Weaver Diaries - Unlocked
description:
The Dream Weaver Diaries - Unlocked is a digital text-based choose your own adventure story. Delve deep into the Dream Weaver world and discover your fate.  Do you have what it takes to become a Dream Weaver, or will you succumb to the shadows?

This digital text-based choose your own adventure story is a prequel to the upcoming YA dark fantasy series Dream Weaver Diaries. Book 1: The Rescue is coming soon.
